tr.td: Default value is UTF-8. Specifies the encoding of the source code.

Default value is 2. Specifies the Java compatibility version of generated class files. If value is 1 generated files will be Java 1.1 compatibel, otherwise generated code will require Java 1.2 or higher.
Default is ${gettext.poDirectory}/keys.pot. Specifies the path of the po template file.
Default is -ktrc -ktr -kmarktr -ktrn:1,2. Specifies the gettext parameters for key lookup.
Default is msgcat. Specifies the name of the msgcat program.
Default is msgfmt. Specifies the name of the msgfmt program.
Default is msgmerge. Specifies the name of the msgmerge program.
Default is ${maven.build.dest}. Specifies the path of the target directory.
Default is ${pom.package}.i18n.Messages. Specifies target package for generated files.
Default is ${basedir}/po. Specifies the path that is searched for po files.
Default value is ${pom.build.sourceDirectory}. Specifies the directory that is searched for Java files.
Default value is en. Specifies the locale of the source code. An empty resource is generated for the source locale.
Default is xgettext. Specifies the name of the xgettext program.
